summary: This skeever free shack located just north of Riften is the perfect starter/survival home for the Dragonborn. Already an old pro? Well this acts as a perfect place for hiding out when you’re in the rift and have a huge bounty upon your head in the city close by.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=5][b]Skeever Tail Shack[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]
This skeever free shack located just north of Riften is the perfect starter/survival home for the Dragonborn. Already an old pro? Well this acts as a perfect place for hiding out when you’re in the Rift and have a huge bounty upon your head in the city close by, or camp out on your travels through the great lands of Skyrim. Inside the shack you will find a new follower to accompany you throughout your journeys as well as a loyal stead outside.[/size]
[size=2]No purchase necessary, terms and conditions may apply. You are responsible for any deaths, injuries, or personal harm in and around the shack.[/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Credits:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=3]Oaristys and Tony67-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/?]Modders Resource Pack[/url][/size]

[center][url=http://whateverdevelopment.com/][img]http://i.imgur.com/OGhEiGh.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: Whatever Development
